summary: Completed comprehensive testing of MUJ Campus Marketplace. Backend APIs working well (96.7% success rate). Frontend loads correctly with responsive design, authentication flow works, search and filters functional. Minor issues with navigation and wishlist UI elements.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - correct behavior but different status code

ui_bugs.issue: User session not persisting properly - user gets logged out unexpectedly
Navigation to add product page via Sell button not working
Wishlist heart icon not found on product cards

integration_issues.issue: Session management - users getting logged out after successful signup/login

passed_tests: User registration with MUJ email validation
Landing page loads with all sections
Marketplace page loads and displays products
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix session management issue causing users to get logged out after successful authentication. Fix navigation to add product page. Add wishlist heart icons to product cards. These are critical for user experience.
